BOWLERS:
create or replace TABLE BOWLERS (
	"BowlerID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerLastName" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerFirstName" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerMiddleInit" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerAddress" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerCity" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerState" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerZip" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerPhoneNumber" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"TeamID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerTotalPins" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerGamesBowled" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerCurrentAverage" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerCurrentHcp" NUMBER(38,0)
);
BOWLER_SCORES:
create or replace TABLE BOWLER_SCORES (
	"MatchID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"GameNumber" NUMBER(38,0),
	"BowlerID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"RawScore" NUMBER(38,0),
	"HandiCapScore" NUMBER(38,0),
	"WonGame" NUMBER(38,0)
);
BOWLER_SCORES_ARCHIVE:
create or replace TABLE BOWLER_SCORES_ARCHIVE (
	"MatchID" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"GameNumber" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"BowlerID" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"RawScore" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"HandiCapScore" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"WonGame" VARCHAR(16777216)
);
TOURNEY_MATCHES:
create or replace TABLE TOURNEY_MATCHES (
	"MatchID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"TourneyID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"Lanes" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"OddLaneTeamID" NUMBER(38,0),
	"EvenLaneTeamID" NUMBER(38,0)
);
TOURNEY_MATCHES_ARCHIVE:
create or replace TABLE TOURNEY_MATCHES_ARCHIVE (
	"MatchID" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"TourneyID" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"Lanes" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"OddLaneTeamID" VARCHAR(16777216),
	"EvenLaneTeamID" VARCHAR(16777216)
);
